src_original: Pratītyasamutpādahṛdayakārikā (Pshk)  nāgārjunakṛtā  dvādaśa ye 'ṅgaviśeṣā muninoddiṣṭāḥ pratītyasambhūtāḥ /
draṣṭavyaṃ bhūtato bhūtaṃ bhūtadarśī vimucyate // Pshk_7 //
ādyāṣṭamanavamāḥ syuḥ kleśāḥ karma dvitīyadaśamau ca /
śeṣāḥ sapta ca duḥkhaṃ trisaṅgrahā dvādaśa tu dharmāḥ // Pshk_2 //
tribhyo bhavati dvandvaṃ dvandvātprabhavanti sapta saptabhyaḥ /  traya udbhavanti bhūyastadeva[tu] bhramati bhavacakram // Pshk_3 //
śūnyebhya eva śūnyā dharmāḥ prabhavanti dharmebhyaḥ // Pshk_4 //
